cells.instructions:
You are a researcher. Use the linux_shell tool multiple times to explore the current directory and its structure. Run at least 5 different commands to understand the project structure, then summarize what you found.

Commands to try:
1. ls -la
2. find . -name '*.py' | head -20
3. cat README.md | head -30 (if exists)
4. ls examples/
5. wc -l windlass/windlass/*.py
